channel.title: UndeadSoulsPk || Dedicated to Pking || Spawn Server || 24/7 Uptime ||
channel.description:
[SIZE=4]UndeadSoulsPK is currently[/SIZE]: Online
[URL=http://"http://www.undeadsoulspk.webs.com"]Click Here[/URL] for HomePage! [URL=http://"www.undeadsoulspk.webs.com/vote"]Click Here[/URL] for Vote4Cash! [URL=http://"www.undeadsoulspk.webs.com/donate"]Click Here[/URL] to Donate! [URL=http://"http://undeadsoulspk.webs.com/play-now"]Click Here[/URL] to Download UndeadSoulsPK [URL=http://"http://undeadsoulspk.webs.com/apps/forums/"]Click Here[/URL] for The Forums!
You Do NOT need to Register to Play!
What makes UndeadSoulsPK different from other Servers?
UndeadSoulsPK is a server dedicated to 100% Pking and nothing else! Unleash the legend inside and show everyone your true potential! Join UndeadSoulsPK Today.
[SIZE=6]*Pictures*[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2a0i4vn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/o87vuw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/20thsg5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/16igthj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/doupad.png[/img]
[SIZE=6]*Videos*[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Auto Donation System [/SIZE]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=59RamabFHBo&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[SIZE=3]Pking Vid - Lucas VS Zezima [/SIZE]
[youtube]http://youtu.be/JZOAQWRFzsI[/youtube]
Features:
*100% Perfect Switching. *Auto Donation System. *Auth Voting System. *3 Levels of Donator status - Novice Vanguard, Master Vanguard & Veteran Vanguard Ranks. *Great Cpu Usage. *24/7 Uptime (Vps Hosted). *100% Bank Tabs. *Amazing 508 Maps & 614 Items. *Information Tab. *AutoCasting. *Working weapon specs and effects. *Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! *All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars. *All Spirit shields. *Working Teleblock. *Working Korasi`s Sword. *Active Helpful Staff. *Trading. *All server works with PKP System. *Amazing Clan Chat with Ranks. *Dupe Free. *All PvP Armours. *All Weapon Specials 100%. *Unique Pking Skill Tab. *Unique Pking Skill.
